title: Disconnected from game and match is now missing?
body: So was in a ranked match and suddenly got DCED around the 15 min mark i closed the client and reopened it and found that it returned me to the normal client screen instead of the one with the reconnect button.  The match isn't in my match history and i know for a fact the game didn't end early so what happened ?

replies.body:
It's likely that there was a hiccup with the Gameservers and the match was dropped for everyone. This would explain why it didn't show up in your match history.

If you have any other questions, let me know. ^.^
